title: 454: On a Spaceship Somewhere, Long After Empire's Collapse
itunes:author: American Public Media
description:
Today's poem is On a Spaceship Somewhere, Long After Empire's Collapse by Jes√∫s I. Valles.

This week, we're featuring poems related to outer space. Stars. Planets. Even aliens. What can we discover about ourselves, when we consider the cosmos?
